com.ibm.team.workitem.common.model

Interface IApprovals


  • public interface IApprovals
    Operations for organizing approvals of a particular work item. Each approval records the approval state of a particular contributor. Approvals are aggregated by approval descriptors forming a simple hierarchy.

    The following code snippet shows how one would set up a review: 

            IApprovals approvals= workItem.getApprovals();
        IApprovalDescriptor descriptor= approvals.createDescriptor(WorkItemApprovals.REVIEW_TYPE.getIdentifier(), "Code Review");
        for (IContributorHandle reviewer: reviewers) {
                IApproval approval= approvals.createApproval(descriptor, reviewer);
                approvals.add(approval);
        }
    Since:
    0.6
    See Also:
    IApproval, WorkItemApprovals, IWorkItem.getApprovals()
